Test Name: Nine-Enzyme Panel for Mucopolysaccharidoses (MPS) in Leukocytes
Purpose: To measure the activity of nine lysosomal enzymes in leukocytes for the diagnosis of mucopolysaccharidoses (MPS).
Container: Microcentrifuge tube containing the leukocyte pellet
Equipment: Microcentrifuge, 37Â°C incubator, vortex mixer, pipettes with disposable tips, fluorometer/plate reader
